channel.title: Posts on Chester's 2nd Brain
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chester's 2nd Brain

item.title: Differentiation Techniques
item.description: A comprehensive guide on how to apply fundamental differentiation techniques in calculus, covering the power, product, quotient, chain, implicit, and trigonometric rules with step-by-step examples.

item.title: Divisibility and number theory
item.description: A comprehensive guide on divisibility rules, prime and composite numbers, GCD, and LCM, with manual number conversions using the Euclidean method for number system representation.

item.title: What Is the Triple Equal Operator in Javascript?
item.description: Understanding the difference between JavaScript’s == (loose equality) and === (strict equality) operators in javascript.

item.title: Fixing 'iwlwifi failed with error -110' on Linux After Dual Boot with Windows
item.description: Fixing “iwlwifi failed with error -110” on Linux After Dual Booting with windows 10/11

item.title: Understanding Algorithms and Pseudocode
item.description: A beginner-friendly guide to understanding algorithms and pseudocode, with simple and complex examples.
